This package is for creating applications.
TeraApp Platforms - Windows

``# app = TeraApp('title', x, y 'color')``

``# app = TeraAppWIcon('title', x, y 'logo', 'color')``

``app.txt()``

``app.icon()``

``app.img()``

``app.input()``

``app.button()``

``app.sidebar``

``app.appbar``

``app.buttonf() - button with function``

``app.inputr() - input with resize``

``app.buttonfr() - button with function and resize``

``app.txtc() - text with color``

``app.sound()``

``app.gif()``


``app.app.exec()``
